Package game.items

Class HealingVial

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.TradeableItem
game.items.HealingVial
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Consumable, Tradeable, Upgradable
public class HealingVial
extends TradeableItem
implements Consumable, Upgradable
The HealingVial class represents a healing item that can be used by actors to restore their health.

  • Method Details

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions​(Actor owner)
      Provides a list of allowable actions for the owner of the healing vial (actor). If the vial has not been used yet, it allows the owner to perform a HealAction using the vial.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Item
      Parameters:
      owner - The actor who owns the healing vial.
      Returns:
      A list of allowable actions, including the HealAction if the vial is not yet used.

      public Item newItemInstance()
      Creates a new instance of the HealingVial.
      Specified by:
      newItemInstance in interface Tradeable
      Specified by:
      newItemInstance in class TradeableItem
      Returns:
      A new instance of the HealingVial.

    • isPriceAffected

      public boolean isPriceAffected​(Actor seller)
      Determines whether the price of the HealingVial is affected during trade.
      Specified by:
      isPriceAffected in interface Tradeable
      Parameters:
      seller - The actor selling the HealingVial.
      Returns:
      ture if the price is affected; otherwise, false.

    • affectedPrice

      public int affectedPrice​(Actor seller)
      Retrieves the affected price of the HealingVial during trade.

      Retrieves the status of the upgrade.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      The status of upgrade.

    • upgrade

      public void upgrade()
      Upgrades the Healing Vial. If the Healing Vial has already been upgraded, a message is printed indicating that it is already upgraded. Otherwise, the Healing Vial is upgraded, and a message is printed to confirm the upgrade.
      Specified by:
      upgrade in interface Upgradable

    • consumedBy

      public void consumedBy​(Actor target)
      Consumes the Healing Vial to restore the health of the specified target actor. If the Healing Vial has been upgraded, it restores 80% of the target's maximum health. Otherwise, it restores 10% of the target's maximum health.
      Specified by:
      consumedBy in interface Consumable
      Parameters:
      target - The actor consuming the healing vial.

    • consumeToString

      public java.lang.String consumeToString​(Actor target)
      Generates a string describing the consumption of the Healing Vial by the specified target actor. If the Healing Vial has been upgraded, the string specifies restoration of 80% of the target's maximum health. Otherwise, it specifies restoration of 10% of the target's maximum health.
      Specified by:
      consumeToString in interface Consumable
      Parameters:
      target - The actor consuming the healing vial.
      Returns:
      A string describing the consumption action.
